text: Jeffrey Alan "Jeff" Slade (March 1, 1941 – February 11, 2012) was an American professional basketball player.Jeff Slade NBA/ABA stats. basketball- reference.com. Retrieved on August 27, 2014. He played in three games for the Chicago Zephyrs of the NBA in the beginning of the 1962–63 after being selected by them in the 1962 NBA draft. He scored four total points in his career. ==References== ==External links== *Kenyon College Hall of Fame profile *Jeff Slade obituary Category:1941 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Chicago Zephyrs draft picks Category:Chicago Zephyrs players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Kenyon Lords basketball players Category:People from Chicago Heights, Illinois Category:People from Sylvania, Ohio Category:American men's basketball players
title: Jeff Slade
